txt.en: Enter the Clutch-hollow and defeat the worms within.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the the Clutch-hollow.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'We have found a den of worms within the mountains. They must be what's left of Scatha's own horde. I cannot abide these foul things to live! Go, and slay them all! For the Zhélruka!'
Complete Mission: The Den of Worms
DNT - 'Slay them all! Let no worms survive!'
'Good work, [placeholder]. We cannot allow those foul beasts to remain alive. I will let you know when we find more.'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
Deep in the Wyrmsgráf, what remains of Scatha's brood makes their den....\n\nYour mission is to infiltrate the Clutch-hollow and defeat the worms inside.
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
You have been tasked with dispatching the worms in the Clutch-hollow.
